blogs.title: Study Links Higher Rates of Hodgkin Lymphoma Relapse in Pediatric Patients to Cancer Drug Shortage
blogs.summary: A national study has, for the first time, linked the shortage of a number cancer drugs to a higher rate of relapse among children, teenagers and young adults with Hodgkin lymphoma. The patients were enrolled in a national clinical trial led by researchers
